segments.text: Can you help me buy my textbooks ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There will probably be a book list in the bookstore . Do you have your class schedule handy ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: To get started , take that list over to the bookstore . Do you know where the bookstore is ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am not sure where the bookstore is .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When you pass the gym , it'll be the first door on the left . Do you know how to sell your old textbooks for money ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I knew I could do that . Exactly how do I go about selling them ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you give your used textbooks to the person at the booth outside the door , he will reimburse you . Can you go over there today ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think maybe I could be there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll catch you later then . Have a wonderful morning .
segments.speaker: S2
